channel.title: NYS:CAVA on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:CAVA on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Cava Cuts Sales Outlook on Cautious Diners, High Growth Bar
item.description: Cava Group Inc.’s shares plummeted after the company trimmed its annual sales guidance, as skittish diners spent less on restaurant meals.
